name: bidisha b
reviewee: If you're a Potterhead, you are definitely going to fall in love with this book! And it would definitely look beautiful on your shelf!

name: Prad Chitt
reviewee: There's nothing more perfect u can ask for by JK Rowling. Its just magnificent. And thanks for the bookmarks. Fully satisfied with the delivery and the product.

name: Alaska
reviewee: One of the greatest literary works of all time. Great for people of all ages. Once you start reading, it will be extremely difficult to keep it aside. A magnificent, spellbinding and fantastic book

name: Serena
reviewee: If you're a Potterhead, you are definitely going to fall in love with this book! And it would definitely look beautiful on your shelf!

name: Derek Thorburn
reviewee: Very bad book provided by Amazing buy.. firstly it wasn't an original,the pages were old and when I returned it they refunded less than half of the price that paid for book.

name: Samantha G
reviewee: I really liked this book. It's about a boy who lives in a broom cupboard at his uncle's house and who hilariously ends up at a wizard-school!.. you can't make this up. It's full of weird terms and magical jargon which makes it sometimes hard to read. Yet it has a nice plot. But i'm not going to spoil more of the story here - read it yourself.
